title: Geokids
creator_credit: Hank Saroyan, Caroline Somers, Bruce Somers Jnr and Lost Kitty Productions
brief_description: Created by Han Saroyan of the “Muppet babies”, this series features three amazingly life-like animal characters called Sunny, Bobby and Balzac. Small children are able to learn about many different types of animals and the way they behave.
creator_credit_for_label: Hank Saroyan, Caroline Somers, Bruce Somers Jnr and Lost Kitty Productions
